title: ULOL
body: The Ulol  registration allows us to register our school but they don't have our campus so we can't register for a Ulol club. Does anyone  have any idea what to do or where to go to register a club for my university?

replies.body:
The registration page mentions that if you can't find your school on the list to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I recommend doing so.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
